General.Name: Hengdeli Holdings Limited
General.Description: Hengdeli Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of watch accessories in the Mainland of China and Hong Kong. The company operates through High-End Consuming Accessories, Commodity Trading, and Watches Trading segments. It is also involved in the construction of consuming service platforms; provision of shop design and decoration services; trading of iron ore and coal; and trading of watches and jewelry business. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Lippo Sun Plaza, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
